name: Galax Blazer C64
description: ... Galax Blazer ... Vox Videogame...presents...a new game with a design & animation by Pinov Vox, graphics and fx sound by Vg Vox...... game made with S.e.u.c.k.  Outlaw "Sensible Software 1987" ...add code in kickassembler... frontend and framework by Richard Bayliss ... www.tnd64.unikat.sk ... gfx front end music and in game music by Vg Vox in year 2020 ...... use a joystick brings in port 1 or 2 ... press the to start your adventure in space ... the aliens arrived...!!!                        ... port 2 controls the ship1... that the best player can win ... hello! .... and ... press fire to play ...!
